page.title: 02Dartford Tunnel
page.content: DARTFORD TUNNEL The Dartford toll tunnel is the most used tunnel in Britain.It is linked on to the M 25 or london orbital.There are two Dartford tunnels one for going North and one for coming South.When the M 25 is finished the tunnel and its tolls will be the only thing holding trafic up.There are plans for a tunnel for heavy trafic only or another tunnel each way.Boath to ease the jamms.There is a waiting area for trafic either of a large size that it could be a nuisance or containing dangerous goods such as petroleum toxic chemicals and explosives.There are two air funnels on each side of the river.The funnels are silver and are a sort of breathing apparatus for the trafic inside the tunnel.As you approach the Dartford tunnel you see signs telling you to get in lane.
